metadata.name: EVO.000.000
metadata.description:
Token #0 of an experimental generative art collection.

3D Animated GLTF generated from the artist's wallet address.

Once collected, the wallet address of the collector will be used to create the next token.

Collector will get 50% of revenues and royalties of token #1, 33% of token #2 and 25% of token #3 directly through Foundation's split revenue feature.
